channel.title: Noting wyvern bones bug
channel.description:
alright well wyvern bones arn't notable
yet there is an item that is noted wyvern bones (people on my server are complaining, i considered making stackable, but eh... doesn't seem wise for econemy)
item = 6812 Wyvern_bones item = 6816 Wyvern_bones(noted)
as you can see, the id's are 4 apart instead of 1 apart like most items...
how would i make it work? (i tryed doing things like putting [CODE]if(itemID == 6812 && takeAsNote) itemID = 6816;[/CODE] in the frombank method hoping it would work, it didn't

item.title: Noting wyvern bones bug
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

and wat a nice suggestion it is, heres the void

get to work :3
http://pastie.org/926504

edit: @lil, i already tryed doing it via item.java, theres only itemisnote meaning that when u bank that item, it’ll give u -1 of the id (noted fur in this situation)

Read full topic

item.title: Noting wyvern bones bug
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

itemHandler.java or item.java in the World package folder (if you have it)

isNotable[wyvernbonesId] = true;

Read full topic

item.title: Noting wyvern bones bug
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“silabgarza, post:5, topic:337380”][quote author=The Soul link=topic=433783.msg3185106#msg3185106 date=1271642744]

[quote author=silabgarza link=topic=433783.msg3185105#msg3185105 date=1271642689]

fromBank() method.
[/quote]read the bottem part of thread? i already tryed…

i know its in the method, mainly asking how…

Oh I missed that part.
[/quote]so any ideas…? ._.[/quote]

Where it checks if the noted item option is set and if the item can be noted, make it also check that it isn’t the bone ID as well. Then you could make a seperate if-statement handling the bone ID. Just a suggestion.

Read full topic
